      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lom.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">

          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>

            <entry>cahi1:data_51177b2d337c67cfb5867a42f23948e9a02452e1</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Using the Bunsen burner</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Verwenden des Bunsenbrenners</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Utilisation du brûleur de Bunsen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Usando o queimador de Bunsen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Per mezzo del bruciatore di Bunsen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Χρησιμοποίηση του καυστήρα Bunsen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Usar la hornilla de Bunsen</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows the laboratory equipments and steps in using the Bunsen burner safely. Goggles should always be used. Long hair must be tied back and loose clothing should be tucked. A heatproof mat should also be used. Finally, the Bunsen burner must be lit with the air hole closed.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">bunsen burner</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">goggles</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">heatproof mat</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt die Laborausrüstungen und 
-jobsteps, in den Bunsenbrenner sicher verwenden. Schutzbrillen 
sollten immer benutzt werden. Langes Haar muß zurück gebunden 
werden und lose Kleidung sollte verstaut werden. Eine heatproof 
Matte sollte auch benutzt werden. Schließlich muß der 
Bunsenbrenner mit dem geschlossenen worden Luftloch beleuchtet werden.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre les matériels et les 
étapes de laboratoire en utilisant le brûleur de Bunsen sans risque.
Des lunettes devraient toujours être utilisées. De longs
cheveux doivent être attachés en arrière et l'habillement lâche 
devrait être remplié. Une natte calorifuge devrait également 
être utilisée. En conclusion, le brûleur de Bunsen doit être
allumé avec le trou d'air fermé.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra os equipamentos e as 
etapas do laboratório em usar o queimador de Bunsen com segurança. 
Os óculos de proteção devem sempre ser usados. O cabelo
longo deve ser amarrado para trás e a roupa frouxa deve ser dobrada. 
Uma esteira heatproof deve também ser usada. Finalmente, 
o queimador de Bunsen deve ser iluminado com o furo de ar fechado.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra le attrezzature ed i 
punti del laboratorio nel per mezzo del bruciatore di Bunsen sicuro. 
Gli occhiali di protezione dovrebbero essere utilizzati sempre. 
I capelli lunghi devono essere legati indietro ed i vestiti 
allentati dovrebbero essere rimboccati. Una stuoia heatproof 
dovrebbe anche essere utilizzata. Per concludere, il bruciatore 
di Bunsen deve essere illuminato con il foro di aria chiuso.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει τους εργαστηριακούς 
εξοπλισμούς και βήματα να χρησιμοποιήσει τον καυστήρα Bunsen 
ακίνδυνα. Τα προστατευτικά δίοπτρα πρέπει πάντα να 
χρησιμοποιηθούν. Η μακριά τρίχα πρέπει να δεθεί πίσω και ο
χαλαρός ιματισμός πρέπει να πτυχωθεί. Ένα χαλί 
heatproof πρέπει επίσης να χρησιμοποιηθεί. Τέλος, ο 
καυστήρας Bunsen πρέπει να ανάψει με την τρύπα αέρα κλειστή.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra los equipos y los pasos 
de progresión del laboratorio al usar la hornilla de Bunsen con 
seguridad. Los anteojos deben ser utilizados siempre. El 
pelo largo debe ser atado detrás y la ropa floja debe ser remetida. 
Una estera resistente al calor debe también ser utilizada. 
Finalmente, la hornilla de Bunsen se debe encender con el 
agujero de aire cerrado.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bunsenbrenner</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Schutzbrillen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">heatproof Matte</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">bunsen le brûleur</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">lunettes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">natte calorifuge</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">bunsen o queimador</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">óculos de proteção</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">esteira heatproof</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">bunsen il bruciatore</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">occhiali di protezione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">stuoia heatproof</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ο καυστήρας</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">προστατευτικά δίοπτρα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">heatproof χαλί</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">bunsen la hornilla</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">anteojos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">estera resistente al calor</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
